TopicTitle: Will we continue getting 3.75m parts in the future?

Articles.Content: After the ARM update we've now got enough 3.75m parts to make a nice SLS replica. However are we going to get more 3.75m parts in the future to give us the same diversity that we enjoy with 2.5m and 1.25m parts? I'm already longing for a flat 3.75 to 2.5m adapter and an upper stage large engine.
They should also add an 3.75m stack separator

I sure hope so!

Although, I would like a 1/8 length tank, and make the 3.75 to 2.5 meter adapter not explode immediately when exhaust hits it.

A flat adapter, a 3.75 meter docking port, perhaps a 3.75 meter command pod?

Also, I would like multi-adapters!

Tricouplers for the 3.75 meter and 2.5 meter, bicouplers, and quadcouplers.

A new LV-N for 2.5 meter stages to go along with a 3.75 meter one as well.

Paint jobs, too. (I know, complicated, but I really wish I could change that SLS theme on the 3.75 meter parts.....)

Right click the tank, click the paint job button, and click the paint job you want. (can add your own)

Maybe even bigger solar panels and science modules to scale up with the bigger parts?
